title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 161.9 - Insurers under common control
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 161.9 - Insurers under common control

State Regulations

In the event an expiring policy is renewed with another insurer under common control, as defined in section
107 (a)(16)
of the Insurance Law, both expiring and renewing insurers under common control shall maintain records, subject to the department's examination, documenting the specific underwriting criteria or other valid business reasons for shifting the policy. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
161.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
